titles.title: A resolution recognizing and celebrating the 200th anniversary of the entry of Missouri-the "Show Me State"-into the Union as the 24th State.
A resolution recognizing and celebrating the 200th anniversary of the entry of Missouri-the "Show Me State"-into the Union as the 24th State.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the 200th anniversary of the entry of Missouri into the Union as the 24th state.
